Intervention: Patients in the process of mastectomy Surgery
Number of persons with mastectomy who were approached to participate in the trial
Eligibility: Also subject to oophorectomy, TRAM or Latissimus
Results: Number of patients eligible in relation to the number of approaches and registrations

• Feasibility will be measured based on the number of patients eligible for enrolment, the approximate number, the number consented and the final sample with the completed data. The population studied will be described in terms of demographics and basic characteristics collected in the registration questionnaire.
Title of the arm/group: Patients in the process of mastectomy Surgery
Description of the arm/group: Number of persons who have undergone mastectomy surgery who have been approached to participate in the trial
Type of measure: Number of participants
